name: BHMJ Scrambled Pic Game
description:
Black History Month Jam Scrambled Picture Game is a game where you unscramble pictures of figures from Black History before the timer runs out!

Use your mouse to click and select a piece and click to where you would like to move it. 

Keep an eye on the clock as time is running out!

The faster you unscramble a picture, you get some bonus time added to the clock!

Can you unscramble all 8 pics in time?
